rev.desc.rev.desc: The wrong format control record was being used for the mass update.
Updated application to get the correct format control record depending on the type of file the bulk update is being done against.

After the get.format panel I added a panel called 'get.fc'. This will get the format control record that matches the bulkupdate format. If there is no FC by this name it will then look for the 'device' format control record. If this also doesn't exist then it simply calls the mass update without a FC record.

descript.descript: The wrong format control record was being used for the mass update.
Updated application to get the correct format control record depending on the type of file the bulk update is being done against.

After the get.format panel I added a panel called 'get.fc'. This will get the format control record that matches the bulkupdate format. If there is no FC by this name it will then look for the 'device' format control record. If this also doesn't exist then it simply calls the mass update without a FC record.
